named-query.name: summaryReport
named-query.query: SELECT b.customerOrderEntity.id, SUM (b.price * b.quantity) FROM BeverageEntity b GROUP BY b.customerOrderEntity.id

named-query.name: detailedReport
named-query.query: select i.dtype, sum (b.quantity * b.price) from BeverageEntity b left join IncentiveEntity i on b.incentiveEntity = i where b.customerOrderEntity is not null group by i.dtype
